                                                                           =
                                      : : Sting : :

                      =
                                                                  Sting smi=
les, and nods, acknowledging the offer.

                                  =
                                                      Sting:  It would be a=
 pleasure to aid you all.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick0=
07 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:43 =
AM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel : :

  Diesel takes Sting'=
s hand and shakes it. Diesel had excepted Sting, he was not a enemie.

  Di=
esel: I have a proposition for you, Sting. We are on our way to Earth, of t=
he past, through the Transwarp rift. We plan to build a great army. Would y=
ou like to join us?

  Diesel waited for a reply.
    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: W=
ednesday, August 14, 2002 12:06 AM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


     =
                                                                           =
                                    : : Sting : :

                        =
                                                                        Sti=
ng nods and then smiles a bit.
        
                                   =
                                                        Sting:  It's a plea=
sure to meet you all.

                                                    =
                         He extends his arm and hand out to Diesel, for a h=
andshake.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: RoboRick007 
    =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM=

      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Diesel : :

      Diesel tr=
ansforms to his robot mode.

      Diesel: I am Diesel.

      He motions t=
o the others.

      Diesel: This is Arrow and Deemos.
        ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
        From: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
        Subject: Re: =
Secret Messages


                                                         =
                                                        : : Sting : :

    =
                                                                           =
            He walks closer, and gets ready to speak.

                    =
                                                                         St=
ing:  Hi.  It's Sting.  Who are you?
          ----- Original Message -----=
 
          From: RoboRick007 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      =
    Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:53 PM
          Subject: Re: Secret M=
essages


          : : Diesel : :

          The dark tanker sees as this =
mysterious bot, Sting, drops down infront of their convoy. He activates his=
 breaks screeching to a stop.

          Diesel: Who are you, and what do y=
ou want?
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Lurker=
Abyss 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, A=
ugust 13, 2002 10:42 PM
            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        =
                                               : : Sting : :

             =
                   A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending from=
 the sky, up ahead, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Deemos=
.  He waits to see if they will see him and stop...
              ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
              From: RoboRick007 
              To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:31 PM
=
              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


              : : Diesel : :

=
              Diesel pulls out, following the others towards their destinat=
ion.
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: Ho=
llywood Narrator 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
             =
   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 9:47 PM
                Subject: Re: Secr=
et Messages


                Arrow transforms into a motorcycle. He whips =
around on a dime and speeds towards the destination. Deems transforms into =
a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...

                  ----- Ori=
ginal Message -----
                  From: RoboRick007
                  T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 =
2:29 PM
                  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                  =
: : Diesel : :

                  He smiled at his friends excitment.

    =
              Diesel: Alright lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, =
we get to kill some bots doing it!

                  Diesel transformes to=
 his fuel truck mode.

                  Diesel: Roll out!

               =
   He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to lead the way.
